name: Focus-Funneling Helper
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Focus-Funneling Device" "246206" #L "Focus-Funneling Spirit" "246207" And to upgrade it: #L "Spirit Training Program" "246209" #L "Spirit Training Program" "246211" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Focus-Funneling Device + Focus-Funneling Spirit = #L "Primitive Focus-Funneling Helper" "246208" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Then you can update it to fit in a different Hud (in order to wear 3 of them !!) Spirit Training Program (Love) + Primitive Focus-Funneling Helper = #L "Loving Focus-Funneling Helper" "246210" ( for HUD 3 ) Skills: | ?? | OR Spirit Training Program (Hate) + Primitive Focus-Funneling Helper = #L "Rancorous Focus-Funneling Helper" "246212" ( for HUD 1 ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Awesome item for twinking.
